title: voom.uz â€” carpooling service
subtitle: Creating convenient mobility
p1: voom helps passengers, drivers and organizations improve mobility and make trips safer, easier and more affordable.
p2: The voom platform was created by FAYKHANUR Enterprises Group LLC to develop transportation innovation in Uzbekistan. voom unites intercity carpooling, courier delivery and urban taxi services.
p3: The voom team develops modern digital services, improves the quality of transportation and helps users save time and resources. We strive to make everyday and long-distance trips more comfortable for everyone.
